languages.text: "Я поручил своему человеку, аколиту Танакии, заслать к Теодоре шпионов. Они проникли в свиту Вольного Торговца, заручились доверием и донесли мне о данном замечательном объекте. Дальнейшее было несложно — я захватил Эпитафию и выдвинул Теодоре условия нашего дальнейшего сосуществования. А она оказалась достаточно мудра, чтобы принять поражение с достоинством".

"I had one of my own acolytes, Tanakia, send her spies to Theodora. They infiltrated the Rogue Trader's retinue, earned their trust, and reported to me about this magnificent object. The rest was trivial: I seized Epitaph and laid down the conditions of our further coexistence. She was wise enough to concede defeat with dignity."
languages.original_text: "Я поручил своему человеку, аколиту Танакии, заслать к Теодоре шпионов. Они проникли в свиту Вольного Торговца, заручились доверием и донесли мне о данном замечательном объекте. Дальнейшее было несложно — я захватил Эпитафию и выдвинул Теодоре условия нашего дальнейшего сосуществования. А она оказалась достаточно мудра, чтобы принять поражение с достоинством".

traits.locale_text: "I had send one of my own people to Theodora. The Acolyte Tanakia infiltrated the Rogue Trader's retinue, earned her trust and reported to me about this magnificent object. The rest was easy — I seized Epitaph and laid down the conditions of our further coexistence. She happened to be wise enough to accept her defeat with dignity."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I had send one of my own people to Theodora. The Acolyte Tanakia infiltrated the Rogue Trader's retinue, earned her trust and reported to me about this magnificent object. The rest was easy — I seized Epitaph and laid down the conditions of our further coexistence. She happened to be wise enough to accept her defeat with dignity."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

The rest was easy: I seized Epitaph and laid down the conditions of our further coexistence. She happened to be wise enough to concede defeat with dignity."

The rest was easy: I seized Epitaph and laid down the conditions of our further coexistence. She happened to be wise enough to concede defeat with dignity."

They infiltrated the Rogue Trader's retinue, earned their trust, and reported to me about this magnificent object. The rest was trivial: I seized Epitaph and laid down the conditions of our further coexistence. She was wise enough to concede defeat with dignity."

traits.locale_text: "I had one of my own acolytes, Tanakia, send her spies to Theodora. They infiltrated the Rogue Trader's retinue, earned their trust, and reported to me about this magnificent object. The rest was trivial: I seized Epitaph and laid down the conditions of our further coexistence. She was wise enough to concede defeat with dignity."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « J'ai donc ordonné à Tanakia, l'une de mes acolytes, d'envoyer ses espions auprès de Théodora. Ils se sont infiltrés dans l'entourage de la libre-marchande, ont gagné sa confiance et m'ont transmis tout ce qu'ils ont pu découvrir au sujet de ce magnifique objet. Le reste a été un jeu d'enfant : j'ai pris le contrôle d'Épitaphe et exposé les conditions de notre future coexistence. Elle a eu la sagesse d'admettre sa défaite avec dignité. »
languages.original_text: "I had one of my own acolytes, Tanakia, send her spies to Theodora. They infiltrated the Rogue Trader's retinue, earned their trust, and reported to me about this magnificent object. The rest was trivial: I seized Epitaph and laid down the conditions of our further coexistence. She was wise enough to concede defeat with dignity."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai donc envoyé une personne de confiance auprès de Théodora. L'acolyte Tanakia s'est infiltrée dans l'entourage de la libre-marchande, a gagné sa confiance et m'a rapporté l'existence de ce magnifique objet. Le reste a été un jeu d'enfant : j'ai pris le contrôle d'Épitaphe et exposé les conditions de notre future coexistence. Elle a eu la sagesse d'admettre sa défaite avec dignité. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Hice que una de mis acólitos, Tanakia, enviara a sus espías con Theodora. Se infiltraron en el séquito de la Comerciante Independiente, se ganaron su confianza y me informaron de este magnífico objeto. El resto fue trivial: tomé Epitafio y preparé las condiciones de nuestra futura coexistencia. Fue lo bastante inteligente como para aceptar la derrota con dignidad».
languages.original_text: "I had one of my own acolytes, Tanakia, send her spies to Theodora. They infiltrated the Rogue Trader's retinue, earned their trust, and reported to me about this magnificent object. The rest was trivial: I seized Epitaph and laid down the conditions of our further coexistence. She was wise enough to concede defeat with dignity."

traits.locale_text: «Envié a uno de los míos con Theodora. La acólita Tanakia se infiltró en el séquito de la Comerciante Independiente, se ganó su confianza y me informó sobre este magnífico artefacto. Lo demás fue sencillo: asumí el control de Epitafio y le expliqué las condiciones de nuestra futura coexistencia. Fue lo bastante sensata para aceptar la derrota con dignidad».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “我把我的侍仆塔娜基娅派到了西奥多拉身边。她的特工混入了行商浪人的随行人员之中，赢得了他们的信任，向我报告了这件与众不同的物件。接下来的事情就很琐碎了，我掌握了荒垄碑碣的控制权，为我们接下来的合作打好了基础。而西奥多拉是个聪明人，愿意坦然承认她的失败。”
languages.original_text: "I had one of my own acolytes, Tanakia, send her spies to Theodora. They infiltrated the Rogue Trader's retinue, earned their trust, and reported to me about this magnificent object. The rest was trivial: I seized Epitaph and laid down the conditions of our further coexistence. She was wise enough to concede defeat with dignity."

traits.locale_text: “我把我的人派到了西奥多拉身边。塔娜基娅侍仆混入了行商浪人的随行人员之中，赢得了他们的信任，向我报告了这件与众不同的物件。接下来的事情就很简单了，我掌握了荒垄碑碣的控制权，为我们接下来的合作打好了基础。而西奥多拉恰巧是个聪明人，愿意有尊严地承认她的失败。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Meine Akolythin Tanakia hat ihre Spione zu Theodora geschickt. Sie haben das Gefolge der Freihändlerin infiltriert, ihr Vertrauen gewonnen und mir von diesem wundersamen Objekt berichtet. Der Rest war trivial: Ich habe Epitaph erobert und die Bedingungen für unsere weitere Koexistenz diktiert. Sie war weise genug, ihre Niederlage mit Würde einzugestehen."
languages.original_text: "I had one of my own acolytes, Tanakia, send her spies to Theodora. They infiltrated the Rogue Trader's retinue, earned their trust, and reported to me about this magnificent object. The rest was trivial: I seized Epitaph and laid down the conditions of our further coexistence. She was wise enough to concede defeat with dignity."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe jemanden aus meinen eigenen Reihen zu Theodora geschickt. Die Akolythin Tanakia hat das Gefolge der Freihändlerin infiltriert, hat ihr Vertrauen gewonnen und hat mir von diesem wundersamen Objekt berichtet. Der Rest war leicht: Ich habe Epitaph erobert und die Bedingungen für unsere weitere Koexistenz diktiert. Sie war weise genug, ihre Niederlage mit Würde einzugestehen."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「私はアコライトの一人であるタナキアに、テオドラのもとにスパイを送り込ませた。彼らはローグトレーダーの従者に潜入し、彼らの信頼を得て、この壮大な物体について私に報告した。あとは簡単だった。私は墓碑を占領し、今後の共存の条件を提示した。彼女は、それ相応の知恵を持ち合わせる人物であり、堂々と敗北を認めたのだ」
languages.original_text: "I had one of my own acolytes, Tanakia, send her spies to Theodora. They infiltrated the Rogue Trader's retinue, earned their trust, and reported to me about this magnificent object. The rest was trivial: I seized Epitaph and laid down the conditions of our further coexistence. She was wise enough to concede defeat with dignity."

traits.locale_text: 「私は部下の一人をテオドラのもとに派遣した。アコライト・タナキアはローグトレーダーの従者に潜入し、彼らの信頼を得て、この壮大な物体について私に報告した。あとは簡単だった。私はエピタフを押収し、今後の共存の条件を提示した。彼女はそれ相応の知恵を持ち合わせる人物だった。ゆえに、堂々と敗北を認めたのだ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Havarilerimden biri olan Tanakia'ya ajanlarını Theodora'nın yanına göndermesini emrettim. Hür Tacir'in maiyetine sızdılar, onlarını güvenini kazanıp bana bu harika obje hakkında rapor gönderdiler. Gerisi pek önemli değil. Sinyazıt'ı ele geçirdim ve birlikte yaşayabilmemiz için şartlarımı sundum. Mağlubiyetini gururla kabul edecek kadar akıllı çıktı."
languages.original_text: "I had one of my own acolytes, Tanakia, send her spies to Theodora. They infiltrated the Rogue Trader's retinue, earned their trust, and reported to me about this magnificent object. The rest was trivial: I seized Epitaph and laid down the conditions of our further coexistence. She was wise enough to concede defeat with dignity."
